document.full_text: toyota motor corp  said it could take until the end of the year before production has fully recovered to levels before the massive earthquake and tsunami on march 11 devastated japan's northeast, disrupting the supply of key parts.
document.title: toyota says output to return to normal by december
lines_and_colors: toyota motor corp  said it could take until the end of the year before production has fully recovered to levels before the massive earthquake and tsunami on march 11 devastated japan's northeast, disrupting the supply of key parts.
